Question.Subject: Is there a way to have Firefox tabs listed at the bottom of the browser window instead of the top?
Question.Content: I've heard it's easier for your computer to run one window with multiple tabs then to have ever page in its own window, but I can't seem to break the habit of looking towards the bottom of the screen to switch to another page I have open. It'd be great if anyone could tell me how to have the tabs at the bottom of the browser instead of the top.
